sqlMap.select: select count(1) FROM t_net_emsmailmsg T where t.state <>0 t.id='$pid$' t.mailno='$pmailno$' t.sendname='$psendname$' t.sendtel='$psendtel$' t.create_date=cast(#pcreate_date# AS DATETIME) t.editor_code='$peditor_code$' t.editor_date=cast(#peditor_date# AS DATETIME) t.create_man=#commstaffId#

select t.id,t.mailno,t.mail_feearea,t.mail_sendoffice,t.sendtel,t.sendname,t.sendunit,t.sendprovince,t.email_fee, GetParValue('PROVINCEID_NAME',t.sendprovince) sendprovincename, t.sendcity, GetParValue('CITYID_NAME',t.sendcity) sendcityname, t.sendcounty, GetParValue('COUNTYID_NAME',t.sendcounty) sendcountyname, t.sendaddress, t.sendcode,t.sendpost, t.sendmailtype,t.sendgoodsname,t.sendcount,t.sendinsure,t.sendinsuremoney,t.sendsign,t.recname, t.rectel,t.recunit, t.recprovince, GetParValue('PROVINCEID_NAME',t.recprovince) recprovincename, t.reccity, GetParValue('CITYID_NAME',t.reccity) reccityname, t.reccounty, GetParValue('COUNTYID_NAME',t.reccounty) reccountyname, t.recaddress,t.reccode, t.recpost,t.weight,t.length,t.width,t.height,t.solidity,t.charge, t.recinsuremoney,t.totalcharge,t.acceptsign,t.recsign, trim(t.recdateyear) recdateyear,trim(t.recdatemonth) recdatemonth,trim(t.recdateday) recdateday, trim(t.recdatehour) recdatehour ,t.remark,t.state, to_char(T.PRINTTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') PRINTTIME,t.PRINTCOUNT, t.create_man,GetParValue('USERID_USERNAME',T.create_man) create_name,to_char(T.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') CREATE_DATE, t.editor_man,GetParValue('USERID_USERNAME',T.editor_man) EDITOR_NAME,to_char(T.editor_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') editor_date FROM t_net_emsmailmsg T where T.state <>0 t.id='$pid$' t.mailno='$pmailno$' t.sendname='$psendname$' t.sendtel='$psendtel$' t.create_date=cast(#pcreate_date# AS DATETIME) t.editor_code='$peditor_code$' t.editor_date=cast(#peditor_date# AS DATETIME) t.create_man=#commstaffId# order by T.ID desc

select * from (select row_limit.*,rownum rownum_ from( select t.id,t.mailno,t.mail_feearea,t.mail_sendoffice, t.sendtel,t.sendname,t.sendunit,t.sendprovince,t.email_fee, GetParValue('PROVINCEID_NAME',t.sendprovince) sendprovincename, t.sendcity, GetParValue('CITYID_NAME',t.sendcity) sendcityname, t.sendcounty, GetParValue('COUNTYID_NAME',t.sendcounty) sendcountyname, t.sendaddress, t.sendcode,t.sendpost, t.sendmailtype,t.sendgoodsname,t.sendcount,t.sendinsure,t.sendinsuremoney,t.sendsign,t.recname, t.rectel,t.recunit, t.recprovince, GetParValue('PROVINCEID_NAME',t.recprovince) recprovincename, t.reccity, GetParValue('CITYID_NAME',t.reccity) reccityname, t.reccounty, GetParValue('COUNTYID_NAME',t.reccounty) reccountyname, t.recaddress,t.reccode, t.recpost,t.weight,t.length,t.width,t.height,t.solidity,t.charge, t.recinsuremoney,t.totalcharge,t.acceptsign,t.recsign, trim(t.recdateyear) recdateyear,trim(t.recdatemonth) recdatemonth,trim(t.recdateday) recdateday, trim(t.recdatehour) recdatehour,t.remark,t.state, to_char(T.PRINTTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') PRINTTIME,t.PRINTCOUNT, t.create_man,GetParValue('USERID_USERNAME',T.create_man) create_name,to_char(T.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') CREATE_DATE, t.editor_man,GetParValue('USERID_USERNAME',T.editor_man) EDITOR_NAME,to_char(T.editor_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') editor_date FROM t_net_emsmailmsg T where T.state <>0 t.id='$pid$' t.mailno='$pmailno$' t.sendname='$psendname$' t.sendtel='$psendtel$' t.create_date=cast(#pcreate_date# AS DATETIME) t.editor_code='$peditor_code$' t.editor_date=cast(#peditor_date# AS DATETIME) t.create_man=#commstaffId# order by T.ID desc )row_limit where rownum <=$END$ ) where rownum_>= $START$
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_net_emsmailmsg (id mailno sendoffice senddateyear senddatemonth senddateday senddatehour senddatatime sendname sendtel sendunit sendprovince sendcity sendcounty sendaddress sendcode sendpost sendmailtype sendgoodsname sendcount sendinsure sendinsuremoney sendsign recname rectel recunit recprovince reccity reccounty recaddress reccode recpost weight length width height solidity charge recinsuremoney totalcharge acceptsign recsign recdateyear recdatemonth recdateday recdatehour remark state create_man editor_man execute_man mail_feearea mail_sendoffice printcount deptid email_fee ,create_date,editor_date,execute_date,state) values (seqformat('t_net_emsmailmsg') #pmailno# #psendoffice# #psenddateyear# #psenddatemonth# #psenddateday# #psenddatehour# #psenddatatime# #psendname# #psendtel# #psendunit# #psendprovince# #psendcity# #psendcounty# #psendaddress# #psendcode# #psendpost# #psendmailtype# #psendgoodsname# #psendcount# #psendinsure# #psendinsuremoney# #psendsign# #precname# #prectel# #precunit# #precprovince# #preccity# #preccounty# #precaddress# #preccode# #precpost# #pweight# #plength# #pwidth# #pheight# #psolidity# #pcharge# #precinsuremoney# #ptotalcharge# #pacceptsign# #precsign# #precdateyear# #precdatemonth# #precdateday# #precdatehour# #premark# #pstate# #commstaffId# #commstaffId# #commstaffId# #pmail_feearea# #pmail_sendoffice# #pprintcount# #pdeptid# #pemail_fee# ,sysdate,sysdate,sysdate,1)
sqlMap.delete: update t_net_emsmailmsg set state=0 where id=#pid#
sqlMap.update: update t_net_emsmailmsg t set editor_date=sysdate mailno = #pmailno# sendoffice = #psendoffice# senddateyear = #psenddateyear# senddatemonth =#psenddatemonth# senddateday = #psenddateday# senddatehour = #psenddatehour# senddatatime = #psenddatatime# sendname =#psendname# sendtel = #psendtel# sendunit = #psendunit# sendprovince = #psendprovince# sendcity =#psendcity# sendcounty = #psendcounty# sendaddress = #psendaddress# sendcode = #psendcode# sendpost =#psendpost# sendmailtype = #psendmailtype# sendgoodsname = #psendgoodsname# sendcount = #psendcount# sendinsure =#psendinsure# sendinsuremoney = #psendinsuremoney# sendsign = #psendsign# recname = #precname# rectel =#prectel# recunit = #precunit# recprovince = #precprovince# reccity = #preccity# reccounty =#preccounty# recaddress = #precaddress# reccode = #preccode# recpost = #precpost# weight =#pweight# length = #plength# width = #pwidth# height = #pheight# solidity =#psolidity# charge = #pcharge# recinsuremoney = #precinsuremoney# totalcharge = #ptotalcharge# acceptsign =#pacceptsign# recsign = #precsign# recdateyear = #precdateyear# recdatemonth = #precdatemonth# recdateday =#precdateday# recdatehour = #precdatehour# remark = #premark# state = #pstate# editor_man = #commstaffId# mail_feearea=#pmail_feearea# mail_sendoffice=#pmail_sendoffice# printcount=#pprintcount# email_fee=#pemail_fee# where id = #pid#
sqlMap.select: select t.id,t.mailno,t.mail_feearea,t.mail_sendoffice,t.sendtel,t.sendname,t.sendunit,t.sendprovince,t.email_fee, GetParValue('PROVINCEID_NAME',t.sendprovince) sendprovincename, t.sendcity, GetParValue('CITYID_NAME',t.sendcity) sendcityname, t.sendcounty, GetParValue('COUNTYID_NAME',t.sendcounty) sendcountyname, t.sendaddress, t.sendcode,t.sendpost, t.sendmailtype,t.sendgoodsname,t.sendcount,t.sendinsure,t.sendinsuremoney,t.sendsign,t.recname, t.rectel,t.recunit, t.recprovince, GetParValue('PROVINCEID_NAME',t.recprovince) recprovincename, t.reccity, GetParValue('CITYID_NAME',t.reccity) reccityname, t.reccounty, GetParValue('COUNTYID_NAME',t.reccounty) reccountyname, t.recaddress,t.reccode, t.recpost,t.weight,t.length,t.width,t.height,t.solidity,t.charge, t.recinsuremoney,t.totalcharge,t.acceptsign,t.recsign,t.recdateyear,t.recdatemonth,t.recdateday, t.recdatehour,t.remark,t.state, t.create_man,GetParValue('USERID_USERNAME',T.create_man) create_name,to_char(T.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') CREATE_DATE, t.editor_man,GetParValue('USERID_USERNAME',T.editor_man) EDITOR_NAME,to_char(T.editor_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') editor_date FROM t_net_emsmailmsg T where T.state <>0 t.id in ($pid$) order by T.ID desc
sqlMap.update: update t_net_emsmailmsg set printcount=printcount+1,PRINTTIME=sysdate id in ($pid$)
